May 2, 2026 Municipal Election

The first day to file for a place on the May 2, 2026 General Election is January 14, 2026.  The last day to file for a place on the ballot is February 13, 2026 at 5:00 p.m. In Double Oak, terms expiring are:

2-Year Term:

* Council Member - Mark Dieterich (Incumbent)
* Council Member - Khourschid Favero (Incumbent)
* Council Member - Geri Smith

* Must be 18 years of age or older on the first day of the term to be filled at the election or on date of appointment.
* Must have resided in the State of Texas for 12 months and Double Oak for 6 months prior to the filing deadline.
* Must be a registered voter in the Town of Double Oak.

Candidates Filed for Place on the May 2, 2026 Ballot.

Town Council Candidate(s)

**Khourschid Favero**

[Application](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/s/Khourschid-Favero-Application-for-Place-on-Ballot.pdf)

[Appointment of a Campaign Treasurer](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/s/Khourschid-Favero-CTA-Form.pdf)

Candidate Packets can be picked up at Double Oak Town Hall, 320 Waketon Road. As Candidates file, information will be posted on the Town website.  Please contact the Town Hall Administration Office at (972) 539-9464 with any questions. We are happy to assist you.

Candidates Filed for Place on the May 3, 2025 Ballot.

* Patrick Johnson
  **Term Expires:**
  1/15/2025
  [Patrick Johnson App](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/s/2025-02-14_-_mayor_application_2-14-25_corrected_redacted.pdf)
  [Patrick Johnson CTA](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/s/2025-01-15_-_patrick_johnson_cta_redacted.pdf)
  [Patrick Johnson CFCP](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/s/2025-01-15_-_patrick_johnson_cfcp_redacted.pdf)
* Town Council Candidate(s)

  Mike Gwartney
  **Term Expires:**
  1/15/2025
  [Mike Gwartney App](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/s/2025-01-15_-_mike_gwartney_application_redacted.pdf)
  [Mike Gwartney CTA](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/s/2025-01-15_-_mike_gwartney_cta_redacted.pdf)
  N/A

  Pat Wellen
  **Term Expires:**
  1/15/2025
  [Pat Wellen App](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/s/2025-01-15_-_pat_wellen_application_redacted.pdf)
  [Pat Wellen CTA](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/s/2025-01-15_-_pat_wellen_cta_redacted.pdf)
  N/A

* = Campaign Treasurer Appointment
